attributes.action: The BBC should be self funding
attributes.additional_details: DURING THE IN / OUT REFERENDUM THE BBC WAS TOTALLY POLITICALLY ORIENTATED AND BIASED TOWARDS REMAIN. AS THIS COUNTRY'S BROADCASTER AND MEDIA CONTROLLER IT SHOULD REMAIN TOTALLY NEUTRAL. IT IS NOT. OVER THE LAST FEW MONTHS IT HAS SHOWN A POLITICAL BIASE. THE LICENCE FEE SHOULD NOT BE PAYABLE TO AN INSTITUTION THAT IS NOT NEUTRAL. OWING TO THE BBC'S BIAS IT SHOULD NO LONGER BE FUNDED BY THE PUBLIC AND SHOULD HAVE TO RAISE ITS OWN FUNDING. THE LICENCE FEE SHOULD BE SCRAPPED
attributes.background: OWING TO THE BBC'S BIAS IT SHOULD NO LONGER BE FUNDED BY THE PUBLIC AND SHOULD HAVE TO RAISE ITS OWN FUNDING. THE LICENCE FEE SHOULD BE SCRAPPED

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are very similar to the one which you submitted:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/123693

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129836
